name: Flávio Dias
title: Industrial Process Engineer
summary: Industrial Process Engineer with experience in manufacturing environments focused on process analysis, industrial CAPEX, digitalization (MES), continuous improvement, and operational performance indicators. Skilled in technical diagnostics, shopfloor support, variability reduction, and process standardization. Strong data-driven decision-making with interfaces across engineering, operations, quality, and suppliers. Advanced English and previous international technical representation.
subsummary: Industrial Processes · CAPEX · MES · Lean · PDCA/DMAIC · Data & KPIs · Shopfloor Operations · Process Stability

Implemented MES system for real-time monitoring and traceability of process parameters, increasing operational visibility and decision support.

Led factory-layout reconfiguration projects improving production flow and integration between operations, engineering, and maintenance.
Represented the company internationally presenting a full case (diagnosis → solution → results) on MES integration in an industrial conference abroad.
Reported to the Engineering Manager with technical autonomy and direct interface with production, quality, and suppliers.
